name: Surrey Peer Education Project
body:
We are the Surrey Peer Education Project (SPED) for Looked After Young People in Surrey.  We meet every other Monday during the evenings. Checkout our calendar to see when the next meeting will be.

We share knowledge on
* sexual health
* healthy lifestyles 
* key skills. 
* cooking
* finances
* school
* time management
* revision and stress


We sometimes hold our meetings in one of Surrey's community homes. The members of the community homes will be offered the opportunity to join the project whilst at the community home. If they like the project and wish to carry on attending then they can come along to the meetings.

If you are interested in joining the project please contact us!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
